name: Link MD
tagline: Your link to the digital world
description:
LINK Digital Marketing is a company dedicated to the development and implementation of digital marketing strategies, focused on small and medium-sized companies in any commercial sector.
We know how important it is to have a well-structured company in its communication channels, for that we support the creation and development of everything that the company needs in the digital field to be able to transmit the appropriate message to its clients.
